g.text: Consume Position event message for Payer
to avoid processing by Timeout Handler.
Validate transfer expiration - Rule: Date.now() < expirationDate
: Continue only if both equal to true, break otherwise
: All timestamps should be transformed and stored as UTC (GMT 0)
: Notifications in break case scenario are being handled by
Request to decrement latest position for Payee
To be delivered by future story
